success.title: Congrats! You have $4 in your balance!
success.description: Thanks to your friend for referring you. We're thrilled to have you with us
success.terms: You can apply a maximum discount of 30% off

errorAlreadyApplied.title: Bonus already applied!
errorAlreadyApplied.description: You can't get another bonus from this link, but refer a friend to earn more

errorCanNotApplyToYourself.title: You can’t apply reward to yourself!
errorCanNotApplyToYourself.description: You can't get another bonus from this link, but refer a friend to earn more

AcceptInvitationHeroBlock.title: Your friend just gifted you $4 off your first eSIM
AcceptInvitationHeroBlock.description: And they’ll get $4 too! This offer only applies to up to 30% of your total purchase

whatIsJetSim.title: What is JetSim?
whatIsJetSim.description: JetSim is an eSIM service that offers affordable, reliable global internet access. With JetSim, you can stay connected in over 200 countries without the hassle of physical SIM cards or high roaming fees.

howDoISignUpThroughAReferral.title: How do I sign up through a referral?
howDoISignUpThroughAReferral.description: Simply click the referral link shared by your friend. This will take you to a special sign-up page where you can create an account and choose your first data plan with the discount applied.

whatBenefitsDoIGetForSigningUpThroughARe.title: What benefits do I get for signing up through a referral?
whatBenefitsDoIGetForSigningUpThroughARe.description: When you sign up through a referral, you'll receive $4 off your first eSIM purchase. This discount can be applied to up to 30% of your total purchase.

howDoIClaimMyDiscount.title: How do I claim my $4 discount?
howDoIClaimMyDiscount.point1: Select your destination for internet access.
howDoIClaimMyDiscount.point2: Enjoy your reward ($4 off, up to 30% of your purchase).
howDoIClaimMyDiscount.point3: Afterward, you can refer friends to earn more rewards.

canIUseJetSimAlongsideMyRegularSimCard.title: Can I use JetSim alongside my regular SIM card?
canIUseJetSimAlongsideMyRegularSimCard.description: Yes, JetSim uses eSIM technology, which allows you to keep your regular SIM card in your device while using JetSim for data.

howDoIInstallAndActivateMyJetSimEsim.title: How do I install and activate my JetSim eSIM?
howDoIInstallAndActivateMyJetSimEsim.description: After purchase, you'll receive a QR code. Scan the code with your device to install the eSIM. Then, simply activate data roaming when you arrive at your destination.

howDoesThisWork.title: How does this work?
howDoesThisWork.description: As a JetSim user, you can earn $4 for each friend who signs up and makes a purchase using your unique referral link. Share your link easily via email, social media, or messaging apps.

whoCanGetTheReward.title: Who can get the reward?
whoCanGetTheReward.description: Both you and your friends can receive rewards:
whoCanGetTheReward.point1: You, as a current JetSim user, will earn $4 for each invited friend who makes a purchase.
whoCanGetTheReward.point2: Your friends will receive $4 off their first purchase when they sign up using your referral link.

whenWillIReceiveMyReward.title: When will I receive my reward?
whenWillIReceiveMyReward.description: You'll receive your reward immediately after your friend completes their first purchase using your referral link. The $4 will be added to your balance and available for your next purchase.

howDoIApplyTheReward.title: How do I apply the reward?
howDoIApplyTheReward.description1: You can use your accumulated rewards on future eSIM purchases. During checkout, you'll have the option to apply them.
howDoIApplyTheReward.description2: Note: You can use rewards for up to 30% of the total eSIM purchase price. For example, if your eSIM costs $20, you can apply up to $6 in rewards.

howDoIFindMyReferralLink.title: How do I find my referral link?
howDoIFindMyReferralLink.description: Simply head over to jetsim.app/(lang)/rewards, and you'll find your unique referral link ready to share.

isThereALimitToHowManyFriendsICanRefer.title: Is there a limit to how many friends I can refer?
isThereALimitToHowManyFriendsICanRefer.description: No, there's no limit! The more friends you refer who make a purchase, the more $4 rewards you can earn.

InviteFriendsHowItWorksProfileBalance.title: How it works
InviteFriendsHowItWorksProfileBalance.shareYourUniqueLinkDescription: Pick where you're off to for internet access
InviteFriendsHowItWorksProfileBalance.friendGets4Description: To cover up to 30% of their next purchase
InviteFriendsHowItWorksProfileBalance.youGet4TooDescription: Credited after your friend activates their eSIM

InviteFriendsHowItWorksInvited.title: How to get your $4
InviteFriendsHowItWorksInvited.selectYourCountryDescription: Pick where you're off to for internet access
InviteFriendsHowItWorksInvited.enjoyYourRewardDescription: $4 off, for up to 30% of your purchase
InviteFriendsHowItWorksInvited.referMoreFriendsDescription: Share your link with a friend to earn an extra $4

ProfileBalanceInvitation.title: Invite a friend and get $4 for you, $4 for them
ProfileBalanceInvitation.description: And they'll get $4 too! This offer only applies to up to 30% of your total purchase
ProfileBalanceInvitation.pendingHelperText: It's how much you will earn if your friend buys a plan. Remind your friend to get their $5 reward to buy an eSIM with a discount!

CarriersLandingBlock.title: Leading network carriers
CarriersLandingBlock.description: Seamless connectivity with top-quality and stable service anywhere, anytime

DownloadAppLandingBlock.title: Download JetSim App
DownloadAppLandingBlock.description: Receive traffic usage alerts via push notifications and in the widget, and easily purchase new SIM cards

Footer.company_address: 27 OLD GLOUCESTER STREET LONDON UNITED KINGDOM WC1N 3AX

whatIsAnEsimAndHowDoYouUseIt.title: What is an eSIM and how do you use it?
whatIsAnEsimAndHowDoYouUseIt.description: An eSIM is an electronic, or virtual, SIM card. You can use it along with your physical SIM card, if necessary. To start using an eSIM, activate it by scanning a provided QR code (or use manual setup).

howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.title: How do I install my eSIM from JetSim?
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description1: Once you complete a purchase, you receive a QR code. Then, follow these steps:
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description2: Scan the QR code to activate an eSIM or use an instruction for manual setup.
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description3: Turn on data roaming on your eSIM upon arrival.
howDoIInstallMyEsimFromJetSim.description5: If you can't scan the QR code, try sending it to another device or install it manually (instructions are provided along with the code).

canIUseMyEsimOnAnyDevice.title: Can I use my eSIM on any device?
canIUseMyEsimOnAnyDevice.description1: JetSim eSIM is compatible with the majority of smartphones, smartwatches, and tablets. However, if you have any doubts, please check compatibility before buying an eSIM. You can check it
canIUseMyEsimOnAnyDevice.description2: or contact your cellular provider to learn more.

howIsEsimBetterThanTraditionalSimCards.title: How is eSIM better than traditional SIM cards?
howIsEsimBetterThanTraditionalSimCards.description: With an eSIM, you can start using local mobile networks right upon arrival, even before going through passport control. You can buy and install an eSIM in a few minutes, without standing in long lines at the airport shops to buy a physical SIM card, and it is usually a more pocket-friendly solution. Also, no need to provide your passport for verification.

onceEsimExpiresCanISwitchBackToAPhysical.title: Once eSIM expires, can I switch back to a physical SIM card?
onceEsimExpiresCanISwitchBackToAPhysical.description: Yes, you can switch back to a physical SIM whenever you need it. Don't uninstall an active eSIM if you want to use it later because you can only install it once.

isEsimSecure.title: Is eSIM secure?
isEsimSecure.description: JetSim uses modern encryption technologies to secure the connection between your device and a cellular network.

canIUseBothMySimCardAndAnEsimDuringInter.title: Can I use both my SIM card and an eSIM during international travel?
canIUseBothMySimCardAndAnEsimDuringInter.description: Yes, you can use your physical SIM card and an eSIM simultaneously. Your primary phone number will remain active, and you'll be able to receive calls and SMS. However, note that you'll be charged according to your mobile operator's pricing in this case, which is why eSIM can be a more suitable option.

shouldIInstallMyEsimInAdvanceBeforeTheTr.title: Should I install my eSIM in advance, before the trip?
shouldIInstallMyEsimInAdvanceBeforeTheTr.description1: Note that JetSim's data plan becomes active once you purchase it even if you don't start using it right away, so plan the use accordingly. We recommend purchasing and installing your eSIM once you arrive at your destination.
shouldIInstallMyEsimInAdvanceBeforeTheTr.description2: Note that you need to connect to Wi-Fi or mobile data to install an eSIM. If you believe you may not have access to Wi-Fi when you arrive, it's better to activate your eSIM in advance.

doINeedToProvideMyIdToUseAJetSimEsim.title: Do I need to provide my ID to use a JetSim eSIM?
doINeedToProvideMyIdToUseAJetSimEsim.description: JetSim doesn't request your ID before or after a purchase. You can buy an eSIM and start using it right away.

howManyTimesCanIUseMyEsim.title: How many times can I use my eSIM?
howManyTimesCanIUseMyEsim.description: You can use your QR code to install an eSIM only once and only on any device.

canIReinstallMyEsim.title: Can I reinstall my eSIM?
canIReinstallMyEsim.description: No, you can only scan the QR code once. If you uninstall your eSIM, you have to buy a new plan and install it from scratch.

canICallOrTextWithJetSimEsim.title: Can I call or text with JetSim eSIM?
canICallOrTextWithJetSimEsim.description: JetSim offers only data plans for you to access the internet anywhere. Our eSIMs do not support phone calls or SMS messages.

canIShareInternetAccessWithOtherDevices.title: Can I share internet access with other devices?
canIShareInternetAccessWithOtherDevices.description: Yes, you can use your phone as a personal hotspot. However, you can't install one eSIM on several devices.

whatHappensIfIUseAllMyDataBeforeTheEsimP.title: What happens if I use all my data before the eSIM plan expires?
whatHappensIfIUseAllMyDataBeforeTheEsimP.description1: If you use a standard plan, your eSIM gets deactivated once you use all the data included. If you need more data, you have to buy another plan.
whatHappensIfIUseAllMyDataBeforeTheEsimP.description2: If you purchase an unlimited eSIM, you can use it during the whole plan's duration. You might experience a slightly lower internet speed after a certain threshold, but it may happen only after significant data use.

myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.title: My QR code isn't working. What should I do?
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description1: Here are a few things to check if your QR code isn't working:
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description2: Check device compatibility with an eSIM. You can do it
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description3: Check your connection to Wi-Fi or mobile data. You need it to install your eSIM.
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description4: Try to install your eSIM manually (instructions are provided along with the QR code).
myQrCodeIsntWorkingWhatShouldIDo.description5: If none of the above solutions work, please

CheckCompatibility.title: Compatible smartphones with eSIM
CheckCompatibility.ipad_model_3: iPad Pro (3rd generation) or later 11-inch, 12.9-inch models
CheckCompatibility.not_supported_model_1: All iPhones below iPhone 8 and iPhone SE (1st generation)
CheckCompatibility.not_supported_model_3: Not all Dual SIM phones are supported. Learn more on the
CheckCompatibility.unlocked_ios: Your device must be unlocked and the iOS version must be updated to 14.1 or newer. You can check with your carrier to see if there is anything you can do to unlock the eSIM in your device.
CheckCompatibility.turkish_device_start: If you have a Turkish-produced device refer to
CheckCompatibility.unlocked_android: Your device must be unlocked. You can check with your carrier to see if there is anything you can do to unlock the eSIM in your device. Within one device model there can be devices both with eSIM technology and without. Please check your device before the purchase.
CheckCompatibility.samsung_model_5: Galaxy S23, S23+, S23 Ultra, S23 FE
CheckCompatibility.samsung_model_7: Galaxy S21 5G, S21+ 5G, S21 Ultra 5G (US versions of S21 are not compatible with eSIM)
CheckCompatibility.samsung_model_8: Galaxy S20, S20 5G, S20+, S20+ 5G, S20 Ultra, S20 Ultra 5G (US versions of S20 and S20 FE 4G/5G are not compatible with eSIM)
CheckCompatibility.samsung_model_9: Galaxy Note20, Note20 5G, Note20 Ultra 5G (US and Hong Kong versions of Note 20 Ultra are not compatible with eSIM)
CheckCompatibility.check_compatibility: To check if a specific device supports eSIM, visit the official website of the device's manufacturer. Look for specifications or features of the device to see if eSIM is mentioned.
CheckCompatibility.additional_info: Additionally, you can refer to user manuals or contact customer support for confirmation. Keep in mind that eSIM compatibility may vary depending on the device model, region, and carrier, so it's essential to verify this information before making a purchase or activation.

PagesMetadata.homeTitle: Buy International eSIM | Global Travel Internet - JetSim
PagesMetadata.homeDescription: Discover JetSim's eSIM cards for seamless global travel internet. Buy international eSIMs for reliable connectivity wherever you go.
PagesMetadata.notFoundTitle: Page Not Found | JetSim eSIM Cards
PagesMetadata.notFoundDescription: Oops! The page you are looking for cannot be found. Explore JetSim for the best global travel eSIM solutions and stay connected worldwide.
PagesMetadata.termsOfServiceTitle: Terms of Service | JetSim eSIM Cards
PagesMetadata.termsOfServiceDescription: Explore JetSim's terms of service governing the use of our eSIM cards for seamless global connectivity. Understand our guidelines and obligations to ensure a secure and enjoyable user experience.
PagesMetadata.profilePageDescription: Manage your JetSim account and personal preferences with ease on our user profile page. Update your information and explore our eSIM services tailored for global travelers.
PagesMetadata.privacyPolicyDescription: Learn about JetSim's commitment to your privacy with our comprehensive privacy policy. Discover how we protect your personal information while providing reliable eSIM solutions for global connectivity.
PagesMetadata.placePageTitle: {title} eSIM for Tourists | Unlimited Mobile Data Plans - JetSim
PagesMetadata.placePageDescription: eSIM for {title} A vast array of virtual SIM cards available for iPhone and Android devices. Get unlimited mobile data plans from leading eSIM providers worldwide.
PagesMetadata.paymentPageDescription: Complete your purchase of JetSim eSIM cards and enjoy seamless global travel internet. Secure and fast checkout process to keep you connected worldwide.
PagesMetadata.paymentCompletionTitle: Successful Order Completion | JetSim eSIM Cards
PagesMetadata.paymentCompletionDescription: Thank you for choosing JetSim eSIM cards! Your order has been successfully processed. Stay tuned for seamless global connectivity with our reliable eSIM solutions.
PagesMetadata.inviteFriendsTitle: Invite your friends | Global Travel Internet - JetSim
PagesMetadata.inviteFriendsDescription: Discover JetSim's eSIM cards for seamless global travel internet. Buy international eSIMs for reliable connectivity wherever you go.
PagesMetadata.allDestinationsTitle: Global eSIM Cards for All Destinations | JetSim
PagesMetadata.allDestinationsDescription: Discover JetSim's global eSIM cards for seamless connectivity to all destinations. Explore our diverse eSIM plans designed for international travelers, ensuring reliable internet access wherever you roam. Stay connected effortlessly with JetSim's innovative eSIM solutions.
PagesMetadata.profileBalanceDescription: Manage your JetSim account and personal preferences with ease on our user profile page. Update your information and explore our eSIM services tailored for global travelers.
